cer.short_descr: CER calculated over the text of a whole page (in by_page) or combined text of all pages (in document_wide)

cer_range.short_descr: Minimum and maximum of CER calculated over the text of a whole page (in by_page) or combined text of all pages (in document_wide)

wer.short_descr: CER calculated over the text of a whole page (in by_page) or combined text of all pages (in document_wide)

wall_time.short_descr: Actual time needed for processing workflow

cpu_time.short_descr: Cumulative CPU time used for processing workflow
